commit_list.message:
The Taskbar button labels can now be changed.

Use the 'messages' props for the <Calendar /> component to pass the labels
as described in the PropTypes of <Calendar />

commit_list.message: minor
minor
minor convenience classes added
added textarea alias for uniform_field_text
fixed bug in ->id() method, and added a hidden field in case the submit input field is not displayed in form
fieldset does not automatically take the primary key from mysql table as field
changes in rendering of errors, fields and fieldsets. added a form_errors method to form class
added hidden field as convenience field type
added render convenience functions
render_fields now takes care of order of given fields
minor additions to filter handling
form->bind() does check for an object before in_filter
added filter option to as_array() on form
field->errors() now always returns an array, also added errors method to form class
minor README markdown formatting
added Installation section to README
fixed some typos, added 2 fieldtype alias classes, made __call public
some restructuring, fixed a recursion, modified README
renamed addfield function
README now with markdown fileending
trying to fix some markdown readme issues
added README as suggested by github
fixed incompatibility with kohana 3.1 where Request object got major lifitng
added form function add_form to integrate fields from other forms in a simple way
removed default length assignment from mysql field
fixed an error where select field would take no additional parameters. added no_submit() method to form class, so you can render form without the submit input field
added a submit label function, also form->bind() now can take objects if they have a ->as_array() method
minor, fixed array key in form class
made default fieldset View generic, added add_errors method so you can merge errors from eg a model validation into the form for displaying
renamed ->is_sender() to sent()
added form functions for individually setting the Form::open parameters

added possibility to check if  contains form data by setting the submit name automatically
also one can now specify a messages file for error messages
check() now has a parameter
made Uniform_Form a subclass of Uniform_Fieldset, some cleanups
added untested usage example
initial import
updated the index file
Mario Ricalde fixed an issue with library loading. no loading of folders with the same name as library php file.
Added tag v0.16 for changeset 418d4d2c3b57
updated version number
updated website
merged with pre 1.7.2 branch
improved controller fixtures, adapted test. some formatting iprovements

applied a patch of Mario Ricalde. This updates CIUnit to work with Codeigniter 1.7.2, additionally CIUnit now uses internal files instead of overwriting Codeigniter.php and index.php

--HG--
rename : CodeIgniter.php => fooStack/fooBase/CodeIgniter.php
fixed a failing test that required a view fixture to be loaded from a path independant of the CI dir
converted EOL chars ofnew generate.php script and added forgotten getopts.php script (a dependency of generate.php)
Added alternative fixture generation script. Load some data into your test database, and then call the script to output a number of rows into yml fixture files.
some formatting changes and a fixed Fixture class that didnt read '0' values from .yml fixture files
made CIUnit more flexible, tests folder can now be put everywhere - even outside the CodeIgniter directory by just referencing CodeIgniter's  index.php location in the new settings.php file
converted everything to UNIX EOL characters
applied path bumz's patch, fixes loading issue when library config file name is cased differently from library file name
fixed issue in the fooStack Loader when trying to load additional db connections. The return parameter now is not ignored.
minor cleanups
Added tag v0.15 for changeset 76e07a465d51
minor line-endings fix for the index.html page, updated foostack to version 0.15
fixed an issue with CIUnit_TestCase constructor incompatibiliy with phpUnit. Added Testcase for dataprovider facility of phpUnit within CIUnit_TestCase
fixtures, db loading corrected. Spyc, removed some values that where handled as true. Only literal 'true' is now handled as such
better set_controller handling, adjusted test case.
fixed lowercase name of Spyc directory
added missing ampersand

renamed controller fixture to uppercase name

--HG--
rename : tests/fixtures/controller_fixt.php => tests/fixtures/Controller_fixt.php
fixed stored controller references, added test
fixed fixtures, changed About to Welcome controller
minor, website
Added tag v0.14 for changeset 97ef80673127
update website
update of copyright notes, more formatting cleanups
one ciunit self test added, minor code formatting cleanup
added .svn to ignore list
CI version up to 1.7.1
fix to make libraries loaded in MY_Controller are all set in the tested controllers
fixed static files function in CIUnit class, formatting improved
small fix for fooLoader, extended CIUnit TestCase to support Selenium Test Case
added compatibility to CodeIgniter versions 1.6.0, 1.6.1
changed line endings of fooXXX components, updated webpage of CIUnit
loading of classes not subclassing anything fixed
fooLoader class can cope with nested libraries now
enable multiple autoload includes during tests - added autoload method of CI_Loader to fooLoader
fixed include config bug, and added workaround to global $OUT variable
added some css to website
minor webpage edits
added bitbucket repository url to webpage
initial import of fooStack/CIUnit for Codeigniter
